import React, { useState } from "react"; const PatientForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", gender: "Nam", dob: "", phone: "", address: "", image: null, }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, image: e.target.files[0] }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Form Data Submitted:", formData); }; return (
